Name: Wish
About the game: Free DLC has been released. Please check the DLC store. Special thanks for modifying Chinese translation -Miguo modifying Chinese store translation -脩羅脩羅 modifying English translation -Laggy Dealer -Definitely Not Stalin About 'WISH' . The continent of Israfil, in a world of sword and sorcery, is where our protagonist, Soma Dakeyon, has grown up, enjoying his peaceful affairs. Then on the day he became an adult, he received an order from the nefarious tyrant and mad emperor Diadora Level to join her harem. . However, Soma, who is driven by the current of destiny, sets out on a journey to save the continent which trembles in fear of the empress… Elf Pontifex, princess knight, the original vampire, amongst others will join him on his quest. At the battlefield where so many beauties are awaiting, imagine what kind of adventures will unfold……..?! Characteristic of Game . ‘Wish’ is a match three game where you attack your enemy by eliminating jewels and making combos paired with a visual novel element. Each woman has a story in which you will need to fight against them and make them your companions in order to ultimately fight against the unfathomable wickedness. Develop your skill, item and capability so that you can abundantly enjoy the adventure in the continent of Israfil. ■ Voice CAST ERICA：相模恋（Sagami Ren) NATRIA：森乃なんな（Morino Nanna) TEIA：歩サラ（Ayumi Sara） VERCHINO：花宮楓（Hanamiya Kaede） ABIGAIL：潮谷篭愛（Shiotani Kagome） POPOTINO：明里芽依（Akesato Mei） REMRIEL：南雲梨沙（Nagumo Risa) DIADORA：椿なつめ（Tsubaki Natsume） ■Japanese Voice Produce step Sound Director：なかせひな（Nakase Hina） Engineer：ひろし（Hiroshi） 2nd Translation Writer：ふぉあぐら系男子（Foagurakei danshi） Produce Step：大野まりな（Ohno Marina） 　　　　　　　高嶺翔（Takamine Sho） Sound Creation Company：株式会社HoneyBomb（HoneyBomb Co., Ltd.） PM：えろフェッショナルΩ(Erofessional OMEGA) PRODUCER：悪眼極(Akume Kimeru) プロデュース会社：MIZUWARI A Special Thanks to HoneyBomb（HoneyBomb Co., Ltd.） MIZUWARI
